> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight felt gulty because two Maximal fellows apparently had lost their
> lives, she didnt really resisted when the Shakritons forced her
> to move.
>
> "He was going to hurt me... He broke the promise... Saberback was a going to
> harm me..." It was the only thing the she could said before she blackout,
> one of the Dark Rodimus had reached her opening a deep wound

<NEW>

"Saberback?!?" DARK RODIMUS said as he turned back to NIGHTLIGHT. As
she swooned he easily caught her before she hit the ground. DARK
RODIMUS' optics was a mixture of anger, sorrow and perhaps for a
moment even guilt as he stared down at NIGHTLIGHT.

Lifting her easily into his arms he nodded, "We are going to finish
this." He said as he straightened once again.

One of the last things NIGHTLIGHT may have seen was DARK RODIMUS'
wicked smile, "Yes, we are going to finish this all, and Saberback
will have to answer for his treachery."

(FTB) - To Be Continued in 'Preludes to an ending'

FTB = Fade To Black

- Preston
